TopicSection.Content:
Spread.Views is a comprehensive grid control for web applications that combines grid capabilities with various functionalities. It also includes the ability to bind data sources. It is based on Javascript and runs on browsers which support HTML5 

Spread.Views allows to customize the appearance and user interaction as per requirement. It supports a pool of functionalities, some of which are multiple grouping strategies, sorting, selection, row templates, dax like calculations, great touch experience etc. Further more it incorporates multiple layout engines such as Card layout engine, Timeline grouping layout engine, Masonry layout engine,etc. which can be used to design custom layouts similar to facebook, pinterest, chat, scheduler, etc.
